title: From Suits To Sweats: How To Work At Home As A Freelance Writer
description: So what exactly does "From Suits to How To Work At Home As A Freelance Writer" cover? Well, you are about to discover everything you need to know to pump out dozens of high quality articles full of superior content every single day! In addition, you'll also learn how to create your own information products as well as how to earn income through blogs, forums, creating and marketing resell rights content, viral marketing, and everything else you will need in order to work from home and earn income as a freelance writer. This book also includes a step-by-step plan for setting up your own online business within 24 hours.
author: Paige Jackson
